Uses of Class
objects.Company

  • Packages that use Company 
    Package Description
    dataManagment  
    objects  

    • Uses of Company in dataManagment

      Methods in dataManagment that return Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company DMComponent.findSymbol(java.lang.String sym)
      This method will look for a Company with a Stock Symbol corresponding to the Stock Symbol inputed as a parameter to this method.
      Methods in dataManagment with parameters of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void DMComponent.addSharesToCompany(Company comp, int shares)
      This method will add an amount of Shares to a Company respectively inputed in the parameters;
      void DMComponent.removeCompany(Company comp)
      This method will remove the Company corresponding to the Stock Symbol inputed as a parameter only if this Company has no Shareholders.

    • Uses of Company in objects

      Methods in objects that return Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Company Shares.getOriginCompany()
      Getter: returns originCompany Origin Company object of which the Shares were bought.
      Methods in objects with parameters of type Company 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Shareholder.buy(Company comp, int amount)
      This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to buy Shares from a Company.
      boolean Shareholder.sell(Company comp, int amount, Shareholder holder)
      This method is executed when a Shareholder decides to sell Shares from a Company.
      void Shares.setOriginCompany(Company originCompany)
      Setter: Changes the Origin Company of which the shares came from.
      int Shareholder.summary(Shareholder holder, Company comp)
      This method will make a summary of all of the Shares purchased by this Shareholder for a Company and return the max amount of available Shares in the Shareholder's portfolio.
      Constructors in objects with parameters of type Company 
      Constructor and Description
      Shares(Company originCompany, Shareholder shareOwner, int shareAmount, double price)
      Share object Constructor.
